# Trust Research Notes

Collected findings for RFC development.

## Repair
- Apology > denial for competence violations; new positive info has ADDITIVE not multiplicative effect (Maliqi et al 2025) (2026-02-04 20:17 UTC)

## Formation
- First impressions form in milliseconds, rest of interaction confirms them (Front Psychol 2025) (2026-02-04 20:17 UTC)
